snippet: There is insufficient data to support the common wisdom that jellyfish populations are exploding, researchers say.
abstract: There is insufficient data to support the common wisdom that jellyfish populations are exploding, researchers say.
lead_paragraph: In 2009, a Japanese fishing boat capsized when its crew tried to haul in a net full of the gigantic Nomura jellyfish. That was just one of the grabber headlines from that year, when the 450-pound jellyfish species was clogging Japanese waters.

headline.main: Evidence for Jellyfish Invasion Is Lacking, Study Says
